Name: SQSRedrivePolicy
Documentation: The RedrivePolicy type is a property of the AWS::SQS::Queue resource.

Parameters.Name: deadLetterTargetArn
Parameters.Documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dead letter queue to which the messages are sent to after the maxReceiveCount value has been exceeded.

Parameters.Name: maxReceiveCount
Parameters.Documentation: The number of times a message is delivered to the source queue before being sent to the dead letter queue.
